title: Jindal Power quits race to acquire Lanco Amarkantak
description: In a sudden U-turn, Naveen Jindal-promoted Jindal Power has dropped out of the race to acquire Lanco Amarkantak Power. Just last week, the company had topped an offer by Adani Power for the distressed thermal power company undergoing corporate insolvency proceedings.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
